name: Chewing Boy (HikoKyoujurou)
description:
Chewing Boy is 2d platformer puzzle made with PICO8!!

One boy after school wants to eat some sweets... so Let's go to dagashiya!! (Japanese old style candy store)

Using your chewing gum, jump over walls, beat spikes, and go moon with monkeys!!

32 levels, enjoy!!

control

( PC / mobile / gamePad)

z / o / a, y - jump

x / x / b, x -  gum

arrow ←→ - move

arrow ↑↓ -  aiming

hold ↓ down key - restart

If you like this game...

Please Comment, Donate and follow me on Twitter!!
